title: Runes Sale Schedule
body: So a friend told me that Tier 3 runes are normally always on sale in the Store but when I checked, there was a random array of runes on sale. Is there a schedule to when runes go on sale or do you have to be lucky to find the runes you want on sale?

replies.body:
AD and Magic Pen marks, Armour Seals, MR Glyphs and AD and AP Quints are all half the price they used to be.

There are sometimes rune sales at the start of the season to get people "ranked ready" but Rune sales rarely happen.

Runes don't usually go on sale. What your friend probably meant are the [permanently discounted](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/starter-t3-runes-permanent-discount-2-weeks) runes that are considered "basic af". They went on permanent sale last season. 

The last _actual_ rune sale that I remember happened at the [start of S5](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/prepare-2015-season-kickoff-sale).
I think it's just the most common runes everyone buys that are 50% off.
